title: otrkid1970
author: otrkid1970
content: What was the cool small baby blue convertible Steve Mqueen drove in the movie The Blob? Anyone know?

comments.author: mich
comments.body: Well do you mean this car? http://www.cultfilmfreaks.com/2017/05/Blob-4Dinosauras.htmlI think this a Plymouth Cranbrook convertible from 1953.

comments.author: sysoe
comments.body: Yep, the car was a 1953 Plymouth Cranbrook convertible, and it was the star of the show. It had more screen time than the Blob, more personality than the other actors, and more style than anything else in 1958.
